loop--4a3ce296-21bd-42b2-b7e1-f4f61af234.description: Identify and remove any unauthorized users repeatedly.

action--4a3ce296-21bd-42b2-b7e1-f4f61af2.description: Remove any newly added users on the system.

commands.command: for /F %i in ('net user ^| findstr /R /C:"^adduser"') do net user %i /delete
